articles.description: Follow build-up to seven Premier League matches, starting with Nottingham Forest v Chelsea.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Nottingham Forest vs Chelsea - scores & updates

articles.description: England are thwarted in the first match of their winter travels as rain washes out the opening T20 in New Zealand.
articles.title: England in New Zealand: First T20 washed out after Sam Curran impresses

articles.description: Oviedo and Espanyol players refuse to move for the first 15 seconds of their match on Friday as the teams stage a protest at La Liga's decision to host Villarreal against Barcelona in Miami.
articles.title: Barcelona in Miami: Oviedo and Espanyol players stage 15-second protest against La Liga

articles.description: Shohei Ohtani deliverers one of the greatest performances in baseball history as defending champions the Los Angeles Dodgers beat the Milwaukee Brewers to reach the World Series.
articles.title: World Series: Shohei Ohtani heroics help Los Angeles Dodgers beat Milwaukee Brewers

articles.description: 'Super' Sam Surridge has already scored the winner in the US Open Cup final, now he's battling Lionel Messi for the MLS Golden Boot.
articles.title: Sam Surridge: The Englishman battling Lionel Messi for the MLS Golden Boot

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen beats McLaren's title rivals Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri to take pole for the United States Grand Prix sprint race.
articles.title: US Grand Prix: Max Verstappen beats Lando Norris to pole for sprint race in Austin

articles.description: Brendan Rodgers sits down with Kelly Somers to discuss his managerial career, proudest moment and joining the 1,000 club.
articles.title: Brendan Rodgers: Celtic manager in his own words

articles.description: European champions Paris St-Germain fight back from 3-1 down to claim a point in a thrilling 3-3 draw with Strasbourg and stay top of Ligue 1.
articles.title: Paris St-Germain 3-3 Strasbourg: PSG fight back to draw thriller and stay top of Ligue 1

articles.description: The potential consequences of defeat this weekend will not be lost on Nottingham Forest head coach Ange Postecoglou, with the club already looking at potential replacements.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Is the writing already on the wall for Forest boss?

articles.description: How Pratika Rawal combined studies with cricket on her way to the India cricket team.
articles.title: Pratika Rawal: How a father's dream led to Women's World Cup
